function.description: Z-scored gene expression across tissues from ARCHS4. Takes a single gene as an input

perturb.description: Please pick a the type of signatures you are interested in.

function.name: KidsFirstTumorExpr
function.description: Gene expression in tumors for a gene from Kids First Open Pediatric Cancer Atlas API

function.name: RegElementSetInfo
function.description: Find regulatory elements that regulate a given gene

function.name: HuBMAPSearch
function.description: Provide a list of HuBMAP datasets based on the user's specified organ, dataset type, or group name. Accept at least one value for the organ, dataset type, or group name, with each holding only one value at a time. Ensure the user explicitly mentions HuBMAP in their request. Repeat back the requested organ, dataset type, or group name to confirm the details with the user. If at least one matching parameter (organ, dataset type, or group name) is provided, do not ask for additional parameters. Do not autocomplete or infer details based on similarity.

dataset_type.description: Dataset Type associated with the dataset

enum: University of California San Diego TMC
TMC - University of Connecticut and Scripps
TTD - University of San Diego and City of Hope
TTD - Penn State University and Columbia University

function.name: SenNetSearch
function.description: Provide a list of SenNet datasets based on the user's specified organ or dataset type. Accept at least one value for the organ, dataset type, or group name, with each holding only one value at a time. Ensure the user explicitly mentions SenNet in their request. Repeat back the requested organ, dataset type, or group name to confirm the details with the user. If at least one matching parameter is given, do not ask for additional parameters. Do not autocomplete or infer details based on similarity.

dataset_type.description: Dataset Type associated with the dataset

function.name: ChEA3
function.description: Which transcription factors regulate my gene set? Transcirption Factor Enrichment Analysis from ChEA3

function.name: KEA3
function.description: Kinase Enrichment Analysis 3 (KEA3) infers upstream kinases whose putative substrates are overrepresented in a list of proteins or differentially phosphorylated proteins. Which kinases regulate my gene set?

function.name: sigComLincs
function.description: What are the LINCS L1000 small molecules and genetic perturbations that likely up- or down-regulate the expression of my gene set?

function.name: GlyGenbyGlyTouCan
function.description: Find information about a given glycan such as G17689DH or a similarly formatted glycan id

function.name: PhenotypeSmallMolecules
function.description: Find small molecules that are most likely to induce a given phenotype or biological process
